ErrorJson.defaultValue: concat(   '{',     '"pipeline":"', pipeline().parameters.PipelineName, '",',     '"activity":"', pipeline().parameters.ActivityName, '",',     '"error":"', pipeline().parameters.ErrorMessage, '",',     '"errorCode":"', pipeline().parameters.ErrorCode, '",',     '"fileName":"', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '",',     '"runId":"', pipeline().parameters.RunID, '",',     '"time":"', utcNow(), '"',   '}' )
